name: Meowzers! Cute Cats Purr
description:
Purrrfect for cat lovers of all ages!

Control up to 3 unique cats through hilarious adventures. Romp through different Adventure-mode worlds, each with unique items and visuals. Or challenge yourself to achieve the highest-purr score in Survival-mode!

• Collect trails of gems!
• Catch tasty mice!
• Dodge nasty dogs!
• Wrestle with cardboard boxes!
• Smash fancy vases!
• Get herbed up on catnip!
• Hide-n-seek in the grassy courtyard!
• Play by yourself or in friendly cat-co-op mode!
• Make your iDevice purrrrr!

Meet the Meowzers Action Cats – Jazz, Quasar and Spark – a friendly family of adorable felines who will meow and purr their way into your heart. Exciting adventures await you together.

Cat lovers take heart! The Action Cats are here and they promise to keep you purrfectly entertained!

Meowzers Action Cats is a fun and light-hearted game for cat lovers of all ages. You, your children and grandma can all play together!

Get in on the cat floor now!
